fields.name: Id
fields.title: ID
fields.description: Unique identifier used in this nuclear power plants database

fields.name: Name
fields.title: Name
fields.description: The common name of the power plant

fields.name: Latitude
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: The North/South position of the plant

fields.name: Longitude
fields.description: The East/West position of the plant
fields.title: Longitude

fields.name: Country
fields.title: Country
fields.description: The country in which the power plant is located

fields.name: Status
fields.title: Status
fields.description: The operational status of the plant

fields.name: ReactorType
fields.title: Reactor Type
fields.description: The type of nuclear reactor used in the plant

fields.name: ReactorModel
fields.title: Reactor Model
fields.description: The model of nuclear reactor used in the plant

fields.name: ConstructionStartAt
fields.title: Construction Start Date
fields.description: The date on which construction began

fields.name: OperationalFrom
fields.title: Operational Start Date
fields.description: The date on which the site began operation

fields.name: OperationalTo
fields.title: Operational End Date
fields.description: The date on which the site was shutdown

fields.name: Capacity
fields.title: Capacity (MW)
fields.description: The maximum power output capacity of the plant

fields.name: LastUpdatedAt
fields.title: Last Updated Datetime
fields.description: The datetime when the data on the specified plant was last updated

fields.name: Source
fields.title: Data Source
fields.description: The source from which the data on this plant was extracted

fields.name: IAEAId
fields.title: IAEA ID
fields.description: The unique identifier used by the IAEA

name: nuclear-power-plants
title: Nuclear Power Plants Database
description: This repository contains a database with information about Nuclear Power Plants worldwide.
